page.title: Freelancer Google Ads Report Template 2026
page.metaDescription: Professional Google Ads reports for Freelancers. Look like a big agency without the big agency costs.
page.h1:
Look Like a Pro,
Charge Like a Pro.
page.subtitle: Stop sending screenshots. Impress your clients with automated, white-label reports that justify your retainer fee.
page.costSubtitle: Time spent reporting is time not billable.

executive.title: The Monthly Recap
executive.description: Simple 1-page summary. Perfect for small business clients who just want to know 'is it working?'.

ecommerce.title: E-com Freelancer
ecommerce.description: ROAS-focused template for your Shopify dropshipping or boutique clients.

agency.title: White Label Partner
agency.description: If you white-label for agencies, use this neutral template that fits any brand.

step1.title: Connect Client Account
step1.description: Secure connection via Google login. We never touch the ad budget.

step2.title: Apply 'Freelancer Pro' Theme
step2.description: A clean, modern look that makes you look expensive.

step3.title: Write Your Analysis
step3.description: Use the text block to explain what you did this month. Clients pay for your brain, not just charts.

step4.title: Schedule PDF
step4.description: Set it to arrive in their inbox on the 1st of the month. You get paid, we send the report.

automation.title: Zero Admin Time
automation.description: You wear all the hats. Reporting shouldn't take a whole day. Automate it completely.

realtime.title: Client Link
realtime.description: Give needy clients a link so they stop texting you 'how are we doing?' every day.

design.title: Agency Quality
design.description: Deliver reports that look better than what big agencies send. Level up your perceived value.

whitelabel.title: Your Personal Brand
whitelabel.description: Put your freelance logo on the header. Build your own equity.

multidevice.title: Mobile Ready
multidevice.description: Clients check emails on the go. Your report will look perfect on their iPhone.

support.title: Community
support.description: Join other freelancers. We share tips on how to explain bad metrics.

tip1.title: Keep it Simple
tip1.description: Small clients get overwhelmed. Show 3 big numbers (Spend, Leads, CPA) first.

tip2.title: Explain Everything
tip2.description: Add a glossary or use our 'Metrics Explained' feature. Educated clients churn less.

tip3.title: Highlight Wins
tip3.description: Use the 'Key Wins' widget to call out the best performing ad or keyword.

tip4.title: Transparency
tip4.description: Show the full search terms list. Prove you aren't wasting budget on bad clicks.

tip5.title: Video Walkthrough
tip5.description: Record a 2-min video scrolling through the Flipika report. It builds huge trust.

tip6.title: Comparison
tip6.description: Always compare to 'Previous Period'. Context is key for retention.

tip7.title: Next Steps
tip7.description: End every report with 'What I'm doing next month'. It sells the ongoing retainer.

faq.a1: Yes, we have a specific plan for freelancers. It pays for itself with one retained client.
faq.a2: Yes, manage all your clients from one dashboard.
faq.a3: Yes, full white labeling is included.
faq.a4: No, cancel anytime if you lose clients.
faq.a5: Yes, perfect for attaching to your monthly invoice.
faq.a6: None. If you can use Google Ads, you can use Flipika.
faq.a7: We use official Google APIs. We don't see your credit card info.
faq.a8: Yes, drag and drop widgets to fit your specific reporting style.
